R

Rabbit - Class in FoxesandRabbits.model
A simple model of a rabbit.
Rabbit(boolean, Field, Location) - Constructor for class FoxesandRabbits.model.Rabbit
Create a new rabbit.
randomAdjacentLocation(Location) - Method in class FoxesandRabbits.logic.Field
Generate a random location that is adjacent to the given location, or is the same location.
Randomizer - Class in FoxesandRabbits.logic
Provide control over the randomization of the simulation.

reset() - Method in class FoxesandRabbits.logic.Counter

reset() - Method in class FoxesandRabbits.logic.FieldStats
Invalidate the current set of statistics; reset all counts to zero.

Reset the randomization.
reset() - Method in class FoxesandRabbits.runner.Simulator
Reset the simulation to a starting position.
run() - Method in class FoxesandRabbits.runner.DynamicThread
will run until the pause() method is called.
runLongSimulation() - Method in class FoxesandRabbits.runner.Simulator
Run the simulation from its current state for a reasonably long period, (500 steps).
